name: Fabled Chronicles [DEMO]
description:
Long ago, the world was nearly destroyed by the Darkness.  Then, it all stopped. No one knows what happened to the Darkness or if it will happen again. However, another calamity will soon appear, and this time, the world will know it's hero.

(Developer's note: This is the first time I ever published a game, please leave a feedback. Updates coming soon. Please report any bugs you find, I'm pretty new at this.)
